item.description:
Sam Blumenfeld, author, lecturer, and home school pioneer, will do a book signing session at Liberty Books and Comics.  Sam is the author of over 12 books.  He has lectured across the U.S..   His latest book is "Revolution by Education."  He has been a long time critic of public education and strongly urges parents to remove their children from public schools because they are at risk mentally, physically and spiritually.  

  His books include "Alpha-Phonics," "Is Public Education Necessary," "The NEA: Trojan Horse in American Education," "The Marlowe-Shakespeare Connection, and his latest "Revolutiuon by Education."
item.name: Sam Blumenfeld autograph session at Liberty Books
